fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Business and Industry, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
Revision of the EU SME Definition 
EU Commission: Public Consultation on the Europe 2020 Strategy 
The European Commission´s strategy on Corporate Social Responsibility 2011-2014: achievements, shortcomings and future challenges

section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The institute's task is to analyse the status-quo, development and problems of Mittelstand companies and small and medium-sized enterprises, to develop recommendations for SME policies and to disseminate its research results to the general public.
